column1: ## data from table 1 of "Linear Free Energy Relationships from Rates of
# Esterification for Hydrolysis of Aliphatic Ortho-substituted Benzoate Esters""
# Journal of the American Chemical Society
# rates are calculated from the ratios of the rates of hydrolysis of ethyl acetate
# reported in "The activation energy of organic reactions. Part III.
# The kinetics of acid hydrolysis of esters."
# acid rate chosen was 43e-6 at 25 deg c in 60% acetone.
# base rate chose was 0.112 M-1 s-1 at 25 deg as per "The Reaction Rate of the
# Bulletin of the Chemical Society of Japan
